website_summaries.verdict: It's small, but it's also well made and packed with action and ample airflow that makes it a good choice for kids and novices.
pros: A mini air hockey table that plays just like larger versions
Comes with a money back satisfaction guarantee
cons: May not suit everyone, especially seasoned players or users who prefer larger tables

customer_reviews.title: My legs though are a bit cramped from all that sitting on the floor but if the kid's happy..
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my six year old son and he absolutely loves it. It's totally game time at our house with some serious competition going on. My legs though are a bit cramped from all that sitting on the floor but if the kid's happy....then mission accomplished!!!!!!!!! Its made well has a sturdy feel and the fan seems to be producing an even draft across the board. This is great for anyone looking for some good and exciting family fun!
customer_reviews.author: cw

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. The fan is not high powered as stated. It is too small of a play area for a child over three years old. I was going to return it even though I had to pay the shipping. But since the return address is in Canada, I found out it would cost more in shipping fees than I paid for it. So I am stuck with it.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: More fun than expected!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up (we didn't put on the stickers). My boys love playing with this table! Decided to get it out at Thanksgiving instead of Christmas. So glad that I did, the whole family got in on a game. Lots of fun and a great size for younger kids!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Fun to play. Easy to assemble and store
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as Xmas gift for young grandchildren. They enjoy playing with it. Easy to assemble and store. Not a substitute for a full sized table hockey game.
customer_reviews.author: Tony L

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy fun
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my nephews whenever they come over. They're younger so it's the perfect size and able to keep their attention for a while. Good value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen C.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: my grandson just loves it he can bring any where and play it
customer_reviews.author: PETER MASTER

customer_reviews.title: Great air hockey game.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our grandson’s 8th birthday. He loves it!! Fun to use. Incredibly powerful fan. Lots of fun to play.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen T. Haynes

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Aside from needing a lot of batteries to run the small fan, this tabletop game works well.
customer_reviews.author: Allie

customer_reviews.title: Prepare to go through batteries
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas gift for my grandsons. The size is small, like tabletop size which is perfect for them... However, it does go through a lot of batteries quickly. They like it and have a lot of fun with it, so I guess if I have to continue to buy batteries to see them enjoy themselves then it is worth it to me.
customer_reviews.author: BarbieJA2

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing product
customer_reviews.text: Fan does not power enough to blow air.... tried multiple batteries. The goals fell off after very minimal play by my children- the screws holding it on are too short. Very disappointed the kids can’t play with their new toy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked well. The grandchildren had fun with it.
customer_reviews.text: My grandchildren had a lot of fun with this (ages 7, 5 1/2, and 4). It was great for the smaller vacation space we had. Worked very well.
customer_reviews.author: Cole's Mom

customer_reviews.title: great table game
customer_reviews.text: this is a great table game for young kids, me & my 6 year old play this and is great. price is good you don't have to do nothing but put batteries in and 2 pieces to keep track of score easy and very fun.
customer_reviews.author: christina

customer_reviews.title: Big disappointment.
customer_reviews.text: Little screw on the battery "door" was impossible to unscrew because the threads were stripped when we opened the game. The air does not flow. The game does not work. Big disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn L.

customer_reviews.title: Air hockey
customer_reviews.text: We all play it .. she enjoy it a lot
customer_reviews.author: Sonia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for kids that have everything
customer_reviews.text: Grandaughter loved this game and I love playing it with her. Easy to store.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Cole

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Received it promptly today, and my employees are already having a blast playing the game. Appears to have been a very smart purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Jentgen

customer_reviews.title: Great for kiddos!
customer_reviews.text: This is so great for kids! My roommates son sits and plays this for hours! Hes 3 and loves it. Just wish it didn't run on only batteries
customer_reviews.author: Team MoKa

customer_reviews.title: Nice tryout for possible future larger game.
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my 7 year old grandson. He really enjoyed it.
customer_reviews.author: jlm

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Our family loves this. Almost a year and we still play this and held up nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany S.

customer_reviews.title: Great game
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. My boys played with it all weekend. Very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this
customer_reviews.text: Box opened, ripped and taped back together , plastic corner broken, wires not attached, very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: We are having a ton of fun with this. The score board moves, and gets annoying to keep track of what the actual score is. Don’t play if both people are super competitive!
customer_reviews.author: Justine Adams

customer_reviews.title: I'm pretty disappointed with it
customer_reviews.text: This was way smaller than I expected it to be. I'm pretty disappointed with it....
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Demske

customer_reviews.title: Great little air hockey set!
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old Granddaughter enjoys playing this with her Dad. It is not too flimsey... just right for a table top set.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This broke within the first few days
customer_reviews.text: This broke on the second day :( very disappointed !!! Don’t waste your $
customer_reviews.author: e. Winehouse

customer_reviews.title: Table top games
customer_reviews.text: You have to hold it if someone gets a little too excited. Like a 7 year old when playing very competitive.
customer_reviews.author: T Ashford

customer_reviews.title: Great fun for toddler
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to play with our 2 1/2 yr old grandson and he loves this. Perfect size and easy to play.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Ludka

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product. My grandson and I have a lot of fun daily
customer_reviews.author: John K.

customer_reviews.title: Kids (ages 6 and 9) truly enjoy this. its small
customer_reviews.text: Kids (ages 6 and 9) truly enjoy this. its small, which, in our case works out well. It is well constructed and enjoyable for the price.
customer_reviews.author: stretch

customer_reviews.title: This is a Christmas gift so I'm unable to report ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a Christmas gift so I'm unable to report on the quality of the game but it sure was delivered fast!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff G.

customer_reviews.title: Small and cheaply manufactured
customer_reviews.text: The goal broke off within the first week of playing with it.
customer_reviews.author: nica

customer_reviews.title: Good quality strong fan lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: Real awesome product my kids love it and great quality product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this four my four year old son for Christmas. Not impressed at all, it took 8 double AA batteries and there was barely any air coming out. Also the wood on the side is already warping.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren puskas

product_meta.title: Point Games Blazing Air Hockey - Fast Paced Action Game - Lots of Fun for Kids- Durable with Strong High Powered Fan for Blazing Speed
product_meta.description: • ENJOY ENDLESS FAST-PACED ACTION FUN: Ice hockey is a game of quick reflexes, smart lightning-speed moves and immediate comebacks, which makes it one of the most amusing and fun table games. Children of all ages will simply fall in love with it! • PERFECTLY SAFE ENTERTAINMENT FOR YOUR KIDS: This is a mini table top air hockey game, 21 inches and was designed keeping your children’s safety in mind – its corners aren’t sharp and none of the accessories included can be swallowed.
feature_bullets: ENJOY ENDLESS FAST-PACED ACTION FUN: Ice hockey is a game of quick reflexes, smart lightning-speed moves and immediate comebacks, which makes it one of the most amusing and fun table games. Children of all ages will simply fall in love with it!

PERFECTLY SAFE ENTERTAINMENT FOR YOUR KIDS: This is a mini table top air hockey game, 21 inches and was designed keeping your children's safety in mind - its corners aren't sharp and none of the accessories included can be swallowed.

A COMPLETE SET WITH ALL NECESSARY ACCESSORIES: This air hockey set includes everything you need to enjoy your games; a high powered fan for blazing speed, 2 sliding score trackers that require batteries (not included), 2 pucks, 2 paddles and, of course, the board itself!

EXCELLENT CONSTRUCTION QUALITY: When it comes to our mini table top air hockey boards, we make a point of using nothing but premium high quality durable hard wood and modern production processes, so that they meet your highest standards and they can last you a lifetime!

100% RISK FREE PURCHASE: We've worked hard to offer you the best table top air hockey game your money can buy. If, however, you aren't completely satisfied with your purchase, we do offer you money back guarantee - because your satisfaction is our ultimate goal!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars64 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
